mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into travel_car (destination_id, origin, terminus, distance, road_toll, remark, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time) values (#{destinationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{roadToll,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update travel_car set destination_id = #{destinationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, origin = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, terminus = #{terminus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distance = #{distance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, road_toll = #{roadToll,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, destination_id, origin, terminus, distance, road_toll, remark, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time from travel_car where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, destination_id, origin, terminus, distance, road_toll, remark, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time from travel_car
